title.rendered: Why Does Your Company Need New-Age Business Cards?

content.rendered:
With changing times the method of communication has evolved. 

We have gone from get-togethers to video calls even with the closest of our friends.

The pandemic has changed the business scenario as well. We have moved from physical meetings to Zoom calls for most of our existing customers as well as our potential clients. 

With Business meetings and events being held online the best way to connect with them is using a Digital Business Card. 

It’s a visiting card you can share 📤 in PDF format where your clients can _click to instantly call you, send an email, ping on WhatsApp, or even find your address on a map One of the major benefits of Digital Visiting cards is that they can be shared with anyone around the world using the power of modern technology. 

Let’s look at some features of digital business cards:

 

1. Always Up to date:

A Digital visiting card helps you to modify the content whenever needed unlike a physical card, if your mobile number is changed then you have to again create a new physical card but with Digital Card you can make the changes as per your need.

 

2. Cost-effective:

Virtual business cards can lead to savings in terms of printing, card delivery time, and transportation charges on the receiving end. No worry about ordering more because you can save the pdf on your mobile and laptop or by mail. 

 

3. Easy Contact Management:

Customers are able to locate physical addresses easily online thereby just scanning the QR Code or with the help of a google maps link. 

 

4. No worries about losing the card:

People may lose your physical visiting card but there is No chance of losing your virtual business cards. It would be saved in their phonebook. It will be beneficial for the future and for the present too as we are growing digitally.

 

5. Enhances your services:

You have a particular service on your website that needs to be discovered, then you can simply highlight and the user can be led directly to that page by clicking on the link.

 

6. Germ-free:

Distributing physical visiting cards invites a lot of germs. And a digital visiting card avoids any bacterial transformation and helps you in a contactless approach.
